    Description
    DateRangeValidator
    The DataRangeValidator provides functions to check whether a given date is in between two dates
    DirectoryUtility
    The Directory Utility class provides all paths for all data files such that there are hard coded paths in our code
    DTFormatter
    The DTFormatter class formats date times to the local Singapore context.
    InputHandler
    The InputHandler class holds all the input functionalities such that no unnecessary scanners are created and used in the codebase.
    Option
    A helper class that stores options and descriptions in a class, like a pair.
    PrettyPage
    A class that contains static functions to handle pretty printing of the UI

    A utility class that provides static function to build strings into serialized formats with ease
